resources.string: 1. The application is use in saving your ids cards / normal pictures in your own storage.
2. Not only saving your ids cards / normal pictures , we can view them , delete added pictures ,then add new.
3. Internet is not all required for this application , as there no sharing your data to cloud or other servers.
4. Your data is stored within the app and once you delete the app thats deleted all the details/information that you have saved previously in the app.
5. Local app storage is used for the application where no hacking or stealing your personal data.
1. After successful installation of app. In login screen u need to select "new user ,create pin" option to proceed to registration screen.
2. In new user screen ,you need to provide a 4-digit pin twice to confirm pin, followed by a secret question to register with the application locally.
3. Then with the pin u have generated, you can login successfully and save the files/photos.
